Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.coupling

Class ClientServerChannel

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.coupling.ClientServerChannel
public class ClientServerChannel extends Object
Abstraction of Ambassador->Federate Byte Protocol for coupling of a network federate to MOSAIC.

      public ClientServerChannel(InetAddress host, int port, org.slf4j.Logger log) throws IOException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      host - the remote host address as an InetAddress
      port - the remote port number
      log - logger to log on
      Throws:
      IOException - if the streams cannot be opened.

    • writeInitBody

      public int writeInitBody(long startTime, long endTime) throws IOException
      Initialize scheduler with given times.
      Parameters:
      startTime - the first point in time simulated by the simulator
      endTime - the last timestep simulated by the simulator
      Returns:
      command returned by the federate
      Throws:
      IOException

      Command: Add nodes.
      Parameters:
      time - time at which the node is added
      nodes - a list of ids and positions
      Returns:
      command returned by the federate
      Throws:
      IOException

      Parameters:

      public int writeRemoveNodesMessage(long time, List<Integer> ids) throws IOException

      Parameters:

      ids - list of IDs to remove

    • writeSendMessage

      public int writeSendMessage(long time, int srcNodeId, int msgId, long msgLength, DestinationAddressContainer dac) throws IOException
      Write send message header to stream. Not used in eWorld visualizer.
      Parameters:
      time - simulation time at which the message is sent
      srcNodeId - ID of the sending node //TODO: maybe make this an IP? -> nodes would have a bilinear mapping to IP addresses
      msgId - the ID of the message
      msgLength - length of the message
      dac - DestinationAddressContainer with the destination address of the sender and additional information
      Returns:
      command returned by the federate
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeConfigMessage

      public int writeConfigMessage(long time, int msgID, int externalId, AdHocConfiguration configuration) throws IOException
      Takes a configuration message and inserts it via the wrapped protobuf channel Configuration is then sent to the federate.
      Parameters:
      time - the logical time at which the configuration happens
      msgID - the ID of the configuration message
      externalId - the external (federate-internal) ID of the node
      configuration - the actual configuration
      Returns:
      command returned by the federate
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeAdvanceTimeMessage

      public void writeAdvanceTimeMessage(long time) throws IOException
      Command: advance time.
      Parameters:
      time - point in time up to which advance is granted
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeCommand

      public void writeCommand(int cmd) throws IOException
      Write a command.
      Parameters:
      cmd - the command to write onto the channel
      Throws:
      IOException - Communication error.
